page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF: _
page.content: A PARENT (Leech Estate, Greenfield) ...My day starts at 7.30am, with a rush to get to work. I am employed locally by a television manufacturing Company. My hours are between 8.30am and 4.30pm, with a lunch break from 1pm until 1.30 pm. Living close to my work gives me much leisure time. My evenings include gardening, walking the dogs, bowling, wine making and especially spending time at home with my wife and son. I watch TV until 11pm, and finish the day with 30min Newspaper reading in bed.... A CHILD (Rush Park, Etherley Dene) ...I woke up at 9.30am and after breakfast went to the swimming baths with my sister unil 12.30pm. After dinner at home I played football with my friend until 6pm. After tea I went kite flying and then watched TV until 9.30pm when I went to bed....
